content: *dress up a pair of inexpensive thong or zori sandals lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 40328 *cff-flipflops pdf* skill level beginner level 1 size varies gauge is not important for this project fun fur® article #320 1-2 balls shown in champagne & black violet & white citrus crochet hook - size k-10 5 large-eye blunt needle 1 pair of colorful flip flops project can be worked with 2 different colors or 1 color using 2 strands of the same yarn for the striped version the designer changed colors every 15 stitches or so optional finish your flip-flops by gluing a large button rhinestone or beads to the toe also here https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-flip-flops-40328-2
